## Description

# Apartment for Rent – Dam W Farez, Tripoli

**Size:** 200 m² **Floor:** 10th **Bedrooms:** 3 **Bathrooms:** 3 **Living Spaces:** Salon, Dining Room, Living Room **Kitchen:** Fully Equipped **Balconies:** 2 **Amenities:** Elevator, Private Parking **Location:** Dam W Farez – Tripoli, North Lebanon

## Elevated Living with Full Amenities in a Prime Tripoli Neighborhood

This **200-square-meter apartment** on the **10th floor** of a modern residential building in **Dam W Farez – Tripoli** offers a refined and elevated lifestyle with sweeping city views, abundant natural light, and a spacious, well-designed layout. Featuring **three bedrooms**, **three bathrooms**, and multiple living zones—including a **salon**, **dining room**, and **living room**—this home is ideal for families, professionals, or long-term tenants seeking comfort and convenience in one of Tripoli’s most desirable districts.

The apartment includes **two balconies**, a **fully equipped kitchen**, **private parking**, and **elevator access**, making it a complete and practical rental option for those who value space, privacy, and accessibility.

## Interior Highlights

- **Three bedrooms**, including a master suite with en-suite bathroom
- **Three bathrooms**, with modern fixtures and guest-friendly layout
- **Salon**, perfect for formal entertaining
- **Dining room**, centrally located for family meals
- **Living room**, ideal for everyday comfort
- **Kitchen**, fully equipped with cabinetry and appliances
- **Two balconies**, offering fresh air and panoramic city views
- **10th-floor elevation**, providing enhanced privacy, natural light, and quiet ambiance
- **200 m² layout**, designed for spacious and flexible living

## Building & Amenities

- **Elevator access**, ensuring convenience for all residents
- **Private parking**, included with the unit
- **Secure and well-maintained building**, with organized common areas
- **Quiet residential setting**, ideal for families and professionals

## Location Highlights – Dam W Farez, Tripoli

- **Central and upscale neighborhood**, known for its clean streets and organized infrastructure
- **Close to schools, universities, supermarkets, and clinics**
- **Easy access to Tripoli’s main roads and public transport**
- **Safe and welcoming community**, ideal for long-term living
- **High demand for rentals in this area**, especially with full amenities

Dam W Farez offers the perfect balance between urban convenience and residential tranquility.

## Ideal For

- **Families** seeking a spacious and well-equipped rental
- **Professionals or retirees** looking for comfort and accessibility
- \*\*Tenants who value high-floor privacy, parking, and elevator access
- **Long-term renters** seeking a peaceful and organized neighborhood

## Why This Apartment Stands Out

- **200 m² of living space**, with a smart and functional layout
- **Three bedrooms and three bathrooms**, ideal for family living
- **Two balconies**, enhancing light, ventilation, and views
- **Private parking and elevator**, offering full convenience
- Located in **Dam W Farez**, one of Tripoli’s most desirable residential areas
- **10th-floor elevation**, offering panoramic views and quiet living
- **Ready for immediate occupancy**, with excellent condition and amenities

This is a rare opportunity to rent a spacious, well-appointed apartment in a central and growing area—now with elevated views and enhanced privacy.

## Schedule Your Viewing Today

This **200 m² apartment for rent in Dam W Farez – Tripoli (10th floor)** is ready to welcome its next tenant. With three bedrooms, three bathrooms, multiple living areas, and full amenities, it’s ideal for those seeking space, comfort, and practicality in North Lebanon.

**Contact us today to arrange a private viewing or request more details.**
